alert.note: Alert for Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 1:10PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MENARD COUNTY THROUGH 200 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Highway 29, or 7 miles southeast of Menard. This thunderstorm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1773, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Highway 29, and Us-83 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
